openAPI.title: Open API

hero.desc: Take your banking experience to the next level with Bank of Maharashtra's AI-powered E-Bank. From secure transactions to smart budgeting, enjoy 24/7 chatbot assistance anytime, anywhere.

questions.question: What should you do if you receive an unknown link via SMS claiming to update your bank details?
options: Click it immediately
Ignore and report it to the bank
Forward it to friends
Reply to the message
questions.answer: Ignore and report it to the bank

questions.question: Which of the following is a secure practice when using online banking?
options: Logging in via a bookmarked official bank link
Using public Wi-Fi to check account balance
Sharing OTP with a trusted friend
Clicking unknown email links
questions.answer: Logging in via a bookmarked official bank link

questions.question: What does Vishing mean?
options: Stealing information via fake websites
Fraudulent phone calls pretending to be bank staff
Malicious software attack
Skimming ATM cards
questions.answer: Fraudulent phone calls pretending to be bank staff

questions.question: If your debit card is stolen, what‚Äôs the first step you should take?
options: Withdraw all money quickly
Report it to the police first
Block the card through your bank‚Äôs helpline/app
Wait for the bank to contact you
questions.answer: Block the card through your bank‚Äôs helpline/app

questions.question: What is Card Skimming?
options: Using a card to skim milk from a machine
Copying card data using a hidden device on ATMs
Fast swiping of your card in shops
Using a prepaid card
questions.answer: Copying card data using a hidden device on ATMs

questions.question: Which is the safest way to remember your banking password?
options: Save it in your browser
Write it in a diary labeled 'Bank Passwords'
Use a strong, unique password you memorize
Share it with a family member
questions.answer: Use a strong, unique password you memorize

questions.question: What does Two-Factor Authentication (2FA) mean?
options: Logging in with username and password only
Using two devices to log in
Verifying identity with two separate methods (e.g., password + OTP)
Using two bank accounts
questions.answer: Verifying identity with two separate methods (e.g., password + OTP)

questions.question: Which of the following is a sign of a phishing email?
options: Personal greeting with your full name
Bank‚Äôs official domain name in email address
Urgent tone and request for login details
Secure HTTPS link
questions.answer: Urgent tone and request for login details

questions.question: If someone calls claiming to be from your bank and asks for OTP to ‚Äúreverse a wrong transaction,‚Äù what should you do?
options: Share OTP quickly to avoid loss
Hang up and call the bank‚Äôs official number
Ask for their employee ID and continue
Give partial OTP
questions.answer: Hang up and call the bank‚Äôs official number

questions.question: What is the RBI‚Äôs official customer helpline number for banking fraud complaints?

savingAccount.heading: Bank of Maharashtra Savings Accounts
savingAccount.subheading: Explore different savings deposit schemes tailored to varied needs ‚Äî from youth and no balance to HNI and salary-linked accounts.

basicSavings.name: Basic Savings Account
basicSavings.description: A standard savings account suitable for individuals and minors (with guardian). No minimum balance for certain categories. Online/offline opening available.

lokBachat.name: Lok Bachat Yojana
lokBachat.description: Designed for low-income customers/BPL. Can be opened with as low as ‚Çπ1 or ‚Çπ0.

yuvaYojana.name: Mahabank Yuva Yojana
yuvaYojana.description: For youth aged 10‚Äì18. Free debit card, fund transfers from parent, utility payments.

royalSavings.name: Royal Savings Account
royalSavings.description: For individuals, HUFs, associations, trusts. Zero opening, high benefit account with relationship manager and insurance.

purpleSavings.name: Purple Savings Account
purpleSavings.description: For ultra‚ÄëHNI individuals. Zero opening, personalized chequebook, insurance cover, high limits.

smartSB.name: BoM Smart SB Scheme (BSS‚Äë15 / BSS‚Äë25)
smartSB.description: Two variants (BSS‚Äë15 and BSS‚Äë25); free RuPay debit cards; varying cheque leaves; no AMC; free NEFT/RTGS.

salaryAccount.name: Salary & Supreme Payroll Schemes
salaryAccount.description: Designed for employers/organizations. Zero‚Äëbalance account with free debit cards, accident cover, unlimited banking.

commonDetails.heading: Common Details
commonDetails.applicableInterest: Applicable interest: ~2.75% p.a. on daily balances, credited quarterly.
commonDetails.eligibility: Eligibility: Resident individuals (singly/jointly), minors (with guardian), HUFs, trusts, associations, NRIs.
commonDetails.documentsNeeded: Documents Needed: Identity proof, Address proof, PAN/Form 60‚Äë61, 2 passport photos; or introducer if missing ID/address.
commonDetails.balanceCharges: If minimum (monthly average) balance not maintained, charges are levied quarterly. BV not applicable for localized types (Lok Bachat, pension, salary etc.).

additionalServices.heading: Additional Services
additionalServices.fixedDeposit: Fixed Deposit, Recurring Deposit, Mahasanchay Plan, Tax-saving Term Deposits also offered. Loan against deposit/FD facility up to 90% loanable.
additionalServices.nriSavings: NRI Savings under ‚ÄúNonResident Ordinary Account‚Äù scheme allows NRI/PIO to open Rupee savings/current/term deposit accounts.

personalPayment.title: Secure Bank Transfer
personalPayment.description: Easily transfer funds securely and quickly using NEFT or RTGS. Provide the beneficiary‚Äôs bank account details including account number, IFSC code, and bank name to send money directly to their bank account. NEFT processes transactions in batches throughout the day, while RTGS offers instant settlement for high-value transfers.
personalPayment.alertUploadPassbook: Please upload an image of the passbook first.
personalPayment.alertOcrError: Error while performing OCR. Please try again.

hero.title: Bank of Maharashtra
hero.description: One of India‚Äôs leading public sector banks with a heritage of trust, service, and nationwide presence.

legacy.title: Our Legacy
legacy.paragraph1: Established in 1935 in Pune, the Bank of Maharashtra has grown into a trusted public sector bank with over 2,200 branches across India. Known for its customer-centric approach and financial inclusion efforts, it plays a crucial role in empowering individuals, businesses, and the rural economy.
legacy.paragraph2: With cutting-edge banking technologies, digital transformation initiatives, and inclusive schemes, the bank continues to uphold its motto ‚Äì Ek Parivaar, Ek Bank.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: To be the most respected, technology-driven, customer-friendly, and inclusive bank in India.

mission.title: Mission
mission.description: Deliver excellence in banking services with innovation, transparency, and integrity while driving financial literacy and rural development.

leadership.title: Our Leadership
leadership.description: Our bank is led by a team of visionary professionals dedicated to upholding transparency, innovation, and excellence. Under their leadership, we are committed to driving financial inclusion and digital empowerment across all segments of society.

cta.title: Join the Legacy of Trust
cta.description: Whether you‚Äôre a student, entrepreneur, or salaried professional ‚Äî Bank of Maharashtra has the right solution for you.

hero.title: Careers at Bank of Maharashtra
hero.description: Join a legacy of excellence and become a part of India‚Äôs fast-growing public sector bank dedicated to empowering the nation.

whyJoinUs.title: Why Join Bank of Maharashtra?
whyJoinUs.description: Bank of Maharashtra isn't just a workplace‚Äîit's a platform for building impactful careers. With a rich heritage, dynamic environment, and commitment to digital transformation, we help shape the financial leaders of tomorrow.

items.title: Inclusive Culture
items.desc: Work with people from all walks of life. Our culture celebrates diversity and inclusion.

items.title: Career Progression
items.desc: We nurture internal talent and provide fast-track promotions, leadership training, and upskilling.

items.title: Job Security
items.desc: As a government-owned entity, we offer unmatched stability with long-term career growth.

roles.title: Probationary Officers (PO)
roles.desc: Dynamic entry-level opportunity for graduates with leadership potential and strong communication skills.

roles.title: Specialist Officers (SO)
roles.desc: Join as a cybersecurity expert, IT officer, data analyst, or credit officer.

roles.title: Clerical Staff
roles.desc: Front-line roles with customer interactions, cash handling, and branch support.

roles.title: Internship Program
roles.desc: Paid internships for college students in Finance, Tech, and Business departments.

cta.title: Start Your Journey Today
cta.description: Be a part of a purpose-driven institution and contribute to India‚Äôs economic growth and financial inclusion mission.
